item.title: 00000.【前言】为嘛要搞这个
item.description: 我研究CSS、HTML、JS、TS的动力不足，想学好这些技术就只能使用这种笨方法了。 案例模板设计 文件名模板： 编号.【TS|JS|CSS|HT

item.title: 00013.【CSS】background-attached属性支持多背景图
item.description: <template> <p> There were doors all round the hall, but they were all locked; and when Alice had been all the way down one side and up the other, trying every door, she walked sadly down the middle, wondering how she was ever to get out again. Suddenly she came upon a little three-legged table, all made of solid glass; there was nothing on it except a tiny golden key,

item.title: 00014.【CSS】关于background-clip的案例
item.description: <template> <p class="border-box">The background extends behind the border.</p> <p class="padding-box">The background extends to the inside edge of the border.</p> <p class="content-box">The background extends only to the edge of the content box.</p> <p class="text">The background is clipped to the foreground text.</p> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> p { border: .8em darkviolet; border-style: dotted double; margin: 1em 0; padding: 1.4em; background: linear-gradient(60deg, red, yellow, red, yellow, red); font: 900 1.2em sans-serif;

item.title: 00017.【CSS】关于background-repeat的更多案例
item.description: <template> <ol> <li>no-repeat <div class="one">&nbsp;</div> </li> <li>repeat <div class="two">&nbsp;</div> </li> <li>repeat-x <div class="three">&nbsp;</div> </li> <li>repeat-y <div class="four">&nbsp;</div> </li> <li>repeat-x, repeat-y (multiple images) <div class="five">&nbsp;</div> </li> </ol> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> li { margin-bottom: 12px; } div { background-image: url("../assets/big-star.png");; width: 144px; height: 84px; } .one { background-repeat: no-repeat; } .two { background-repeat: repeat; } .three { background-repeat: repeat-x; } .four { background-repeat: repeat-y; } .five { background-image: url("../assets/big-star.png"),url("../assets/star.png");

item.title: 00018.【CSS】传记风格的设计
item.description: <template> <div class="main"> <h1>Jane Doe</h1> <div class="job-title">Web Developer</div> <p>Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.</p> <p>A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences

item.title: 00019.【CSS】演示border简单的配置
item.description: <template> <div class="box"> <h2>Borders</h2> <p>Try changing the borders.</p> </div> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> .box { background-color: #567895; border: 5px solid #0b385f; border-bottom-style: dashed; color: #ffffff; } .box { /*border-radius: 10px;*/ border-top-right-radius: 1em 10%; } h2 { border-top: 2px dotted rebeccapurple; border-bottom: 1em double rgb(24, 163, 78); } </style>

item.title: 00020.【CSS】关于边框和背景的小练习
item.description: <template> <div class="box"> <h2>Backgrounds & Borders</h2> </div> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> .box { border: 5px solid; border-radius: 10px; background-image: url("../assets/balloons.jpg"); background-size: cover; } h2 { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .5); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); } </style>

item.title: 00021.【CSS】选择器的简单演示
item.description: <template> <h1>Type selectors</h1> <p>Veggies es bonus vobis, proinde vos postulo essum magis <span>kohlrabi welsh onion</span> daikon amaranth tatsoi tomatillo melon azuki bean garlic.</p> <p>Gumbo beet greens corn soko <strong>endive</strong> gumbo gourd. Parsley shallot courgette tatsoi pea sprouts fava bean collard greens dandelion okra wakame tomato. Dandelion cucumber earthnut pea peanut soko zucchini.</p> <p>Turnip greens yarrow ricebean rutabaga <em>endive cauliflower</em> sea lettuce kohlrabi amaranth water spinach avocado daikon napa cabbage asparagus

item.title: 00024.【CSS】类选择器的简单使用2
item.description: <template> <div class="notebox"> This is an informational note. </div> <div class="notebox warning"> This note shows a warning. </div> <div class="notebox danger"> This note shows danger! </div> <div class="danger"> This won't get styled — it also needs to have the notebox class </div> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> .notebox { border: 4px solid #666; } .notebox.warning { border-color: orange; font-weight: bold; } .notebox.danger { border-color: red; font-weight: bold; } </style>

item.title: 00025.【CSS】ID选择器的简单使用
item.description: <template> <h1 id="heading">ID selector</h1> <p>Veggies es bonus vobis, proinde vos postulo essum magis kohlrabi welsh onion daikon amaranth tatsoi tomatillo melon azuki bean garlic.</p> <p id="one">Gumbo beet greens corn soko <strong>endive</strong> gumbo gourd. Parsley shallot courgette tatsoi pea sprouts fava bean collard greens dandelion okra wakame tomato. Dandelion cucumber earthnut pea peanut soko zucchini.</p> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> #one { background-color: yellow; } h1#heading { color: rebeccapurple; }

item.title: 00026.【CSS】css-challenges.com挑战001
item.description: <template> <div class="box"></div> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> .box { width: 280px; height: 280px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: "Inconsolata", monospace; font-size: 28px; border: 1px solid #c39f76; box-sizing: border-box; } .box::before{ content: "Hello World"; font-size: 28px; font-weight: normal; } </style>

item.title: 00027.【CSS】css-challenges.com挑战002
item.description: <template> <div class="box"></div> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> .box { width: 280px; height: 280px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: "Inconsolata", monospace; font-size: 28px; border: 1px solid #c39f76; box-sizing: border-box; } .box::before{ content:"Hello\AWorld"; white-space:pre } </style> 小结 white-space属性还不是很理解。

item.title: 00028.【CSS】属性选择器的简单使用
item.description: <template> <h1>Attribute presence and value selectors</h1> <ul> <li>Item 1</li> <li class="a">Item 2</li> <li class="a b">Item 3</li> <li class="ab">Item 4</li> </ul> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> li[class] { font-size: 200%; } li[class="a"] { background-color: yellow; } li[class~="a"] { color: red; } </style>

item.title: 00029.【CSS】属性选择器中子字符串匹配选择器
item.description: <template> <h1>Attribute presence and value selectors</h1> <ul> <li class="a">Item 1</li> <li class="ab">Item 2</li> <li class="bca">Item 3</li> <li class="baabc">Item 4</li> </ul> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> li[class^="a"] { font-size: 200%; } li[class$="a"] { background-color: yellow; } li[class*="a"] { color: red; } </style>

item.title: 00030.【CSS】属性选择器如何配置大小写不敏感
item.description: <template> <h1>Attribute presence and value selectors</h1> <ul> <li class="a">Item 1</li> <li class="A">Item 2</li> <li class="AB">Item 3</li> </ul> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> li[class^="a"] { background-color: yellow; } li[class^="a" i] { color: red; } </style>

item.title: 00031.【CSS】伪类的简单使用
item.description: <template> <!-- 伪类是选择器的一种，它用于选择处于特定状态的元素，比如当它们是这一类型的第一个元素时 ， 或者是当鼠标指针悬浮在元素上面的时候。它们表现得会

item.title: 00032.【CSS】用户行为伪类的使用
item.description: <template> <p><a href="">Hover over me</a></p> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> a:link, a:visited { color: rebeccapurple; font-weight: bold; } a:hover { color: hotpink; } </style>

item.title: 00033.【CSS】简单接触一下伪元素及伪元素和伪类的混合使用
item.description: <template> <!-- 伪元素表现得是像你往编辑文本中加入权限的HTML元素一样，而不是向现有的元素上应用类 --> <!-- 可不可以这么理解：伪元素更偏向于从无到有的创造这

item.title: 00035.【CSS】后代选择器的案例
item.description: <template> <div class="box"> <p>Text in .box</p> </div> <p>Text not in .box</p> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> .box p { color: red } </style>

item.title: 00037.【CSS】邻接兄弟选择器
item.description: <template> <!-- 邻接兄弟选择器只会选择紧邻的哪一个，而且是向后的 --> <article> <p>这个P会被选择么？</p> <h1>A heading</h1> <p>Veggies es bonus vobis, proinde vos postulo essum magis kohlrabi welsh onion

item.title: 00038.【CSS】通用兄弟选择器
item.description: <template> <!-- 通用兄弟选择器，只能选择弟弟，不能选择兄，h1之前的元素就没有被选择。 --> <article> <p>这个也会被选择么？</p> <h1>A heading</h1> <p>I

item.title: 00039.【CSS】边关相关的简单案例
item.description: <template> <div class="a"> I have a border, an outline, AND a box shadow! Amazing, isn't it? </div> <div class="b"> This box has a border on the bottom side. </div> <div class="c"> <p>This is a box with a border around it. Note which side of the box is <span class="redtext">red</span>.</p> </div> <div class="d"> <table> <tr> <td class="b1">none</td> <td class="b2">hidden</td> <td class="b3">dotted</td> <td class="b4">dashed</td> </tr> <tr> <td class="b5">solid</td> <td class="b6">double</td> <td class="b7">groove</td>

item.title: 00040.【CSS】演示了border-width的使用
item.description: <template> <div> <p id="sval"> one value: 6px wide border on all 4 sides</p> <p id="bival"> two different values: 2px wide top and bottom border, 10px wide right and left border</p> <p id="treval"> three different values: 0.3em top, 9px bottom, and zero width right and left</p> <p id="fourval"> four different values: "thin" top, "medium" right, "thick" bottom, and 1em right</p> </div> </template> <script setup> </script> <style scoped> #sval { border: 6px

item.title: 00041.【CSS】边关相关的简单案例2
item.description: <template> <div class="a"> <div>Element 1</div> <div>Element 2</div> </div> <div class="b"> <table> <tr> <td class="b1">none</td> <td class="b2">hidden</td> <td class="b3">dotted</td> <td class="b4">dashed</td> </tr> <tr> <td class="b5">solid</td> <td class="b6">double</td> <td class="b7">groove</td> <td class="b8">ridge</td> </tr> <tr> <td class="b9">inset</td> <td class="b10">outset</td> </tr> </table> </div> <div class="c"> <div class="mybox"> <p>This is a box with a border around it. Note which side of the box is <span class="redtext">red</span>.</p> </div> </div> <div class="d"> This box has a border
